title: Resolution input!
body: Guys i need help i just changed my monitors resolution its 1280x1024 so my league client is working fine but when i go into the game the screen goes black and my monitor says no Input i tried to google people said i should go to game.cfg and change height and width to my monitors setting i did that but it works only on border-less window not full screen please help,and if i change my games resolution different than my monitors it will work right? so all i ask is that how do i get it to work in full screen mode it goes black (NO INPUT)please help (WILL IT WORK IF I UNISTALL AND REINSTALL??)

replies.body:
It sounds like you might be having a very specific issue with your graphics settings that is messing with your resolution. Since there are a number of different things that could be causing this, it would be best for you to get some one on one help with one of our tech agents.

Reach out to us in a [ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we'll be able to look much more in depth there.
